title: Pennington Biomedical Research Center to become Louisiana's first mass vaccination site for coronavirus vaccine
author: Updated Sep 7
cleaned_text: 4:43 AM CDT| Health officials are advising people to stay up to date with COVID vaccines, to improve indoor ventilation and to stay at home when sick. Updated: Sep. 5, 2023 at 4:36 PM CDT Starting in October, ANEW Place's Champlain Inn in Burlington will have a new organization taking over. Updated: Aug. 30, 2023 at 4:03 AM CDT| Health officials and the White House are encouraging Americans to get shots for COVID-19, RSV and the flu. Updated: Aug. 29, 2023 at 4:32 PM CDT| Updated: Aug. 24, 2023 at 12:17 AM CDT| Experts are warning high-risk individuals and their caretakers to take precautions in crowds amid a recent uptick in COVID-19 hospitalizations. Updated: Aug. 17, 2023 at 4:12 AM CDT| The CDC says COVID-19 hospitalizations have been climbing since early July.
